item.title: ‘Kim Novak’s Vertigo’ Review: One of the Last Living Legends of Hollywood’s Golden Age Has Plenty Still to Say for Herself
item.description: After years of retirement and general seclusion, Kim Novak returned to the public eye as a presenter at the Oscars in 2014 — a welcome surprise for classic film buffs and a vicious snarking opportunit
